name: The Inspired Stone
description:
Collect spheres, open doors and move on

Mouse position: direction of movement

Left Click or Spacebar: freeze

Right Click or R: return to start

Click on top or Escape: menu

Several options are available in the settings menu.

Finished locations:

Castle: 24 rooms (courtyard, rooms and basement)

Next development location:

Neighboring village (houses, workshops, church).
